text: The Helix Oxford Smart School is a higher-secondary co-education private school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 2011 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in India
title: The Helix Oxford Smart School
